Text: Grand Chenere outage last cycle on the th Cc I tried to leave you a message about what happened on the last cycle for gas day but your voicemail at the office didnt work Grand Chenere compressor went down by MM in total late saturday night This affected of supply coming from HIOS and SE Transmission pool purchases I was able to make up on the th by increasing our HIOS nom and paying back PGE ANR said the compressor is back up now however with shippers doing makeup this could cause more capacity cuts for the th Ill be back tomorrow Ive got jury duty today WT left me a messge at the office that they went down but they didnt page me so we were cut at SS over the weekendwhich also cut our SE Tran markets Ive taken them down to unless youd like to shut them in Deal Mark pager Kirk Shawn at Duke said he cut us at NMaumeeML by see if our Mkt wants makeup for th

Re Fwd VR Nominations Cc As I said in the earlier Email We were done trading by the time you told me you needed to lower your nom therefore I need to know what you would like to adjust the tuesday volumes to in order to make up the short that I have created over the weekend Please call me to discuss also I advised WT of the same they have given me a revised number based on Petroquests assumptions Thanks Mark

Francis Berry Johnson Bayou Gas for Oct Cc As you know Grand Cheniere was under maintenance in October and we had to shut in Johson Bayou Francis wants us to reallocate trespass gas that they continued to flow onto ANR in the amout of mm to us at an agreed upon price of ANR has agreed to do this next week Since you are out today Francis asked us to make sure you called him about this as well as another issue Mark

DEVON June noms Cc Please forward to Victor also but for next month Ill need the first of the month nominations asap in order to confirm all locations total Index and Gas Daily volumes for both HIOS and ANR Please let me know as soon as possible and also send final revisions directly to me I will also need to confirm totals verbally after you have send the final nominations for June Thanks Mark

Re Fwd Gas ReAllocation for November VR A Platform Cc We had to wait until ANR completed their Cash Out Prices for November It was finally posted in GEMS ANRs system and we will now enter it into system in order for you to get payment Tom Donohoe agrees to pay gas daily up to our imbalance which is MM and ANRs Cash Out price for any volume over that We also had to wait a few days after the end of the month to get a correct allocation for the well ANR is about days behind on any given day Thanks Mark

Fwd December Nominations for VR VR AADI politely advised the lady with Spinnaker that she needs to get me the changes by or I would have to make the change the following day Just a FYIthey called at and just Emailed it to me Mark Forwarded by Mark L SchrabHOUECT on PM on AM To cc Subject Fwd December Nominations for VR VR AAD Nelson please coordinate renominations per attached If for any reason Enron differs in opinion please advise asap ReturnPath Received from rlyzdmxaolcom rlyzdmailaolcom by airzdmailaolcom v with ESMTP Mon Dec Received from linuxglobalreachnet linuxglobalreachnet by rlyzdmxaolcom vr with ESMTP Mon Dec Received from marilyn asglobalreachnet by linuxglobalreachnet with SMTP id KAA Mon Dec From Marilyn Gullette To Bill Young Email Tom Jones Email Cc Alfred Thomas IIIlinuxglobalreachnet Subject December Nominations for VR VR AAD Date Mon Dec MessageID eceecacmarilyn MIMEVersion ContentType multipartmixed boundaryNextPartFCDDEE XPriority Normal XMSMailPriority Normal XMailer Microsoft Outlook CWS Build XMimeOLE Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V Importance Normal This is to request that Spinnaker increase their nomination effective as soon as possible from the current to A spreadsheet is attached showing the figures and method used to determine the requested rate I will continue to monitor the wells daily for rate changes and will advise of required changes in noms Please advise when you have increased your nom and the effective date either by email or telephone direct line Thank you for your cooperation in this effort to maintain a balance between noms and delivery WS to calc suggested noms for Dec VR xls
one has no volume but be careful Why women cant be mechanics

RE Dec Forwarded by Mark L SchrabHOUECT on AM Lesley Strange on AM To cc Subject RE Dec I have attached the sheet and would you please give it to whom ever else is on this list for our stuff to nominate Also talk to Naleesha Roberts about the other question Her number is If you have any other questions please let me know Lesley Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday November AM To Subject Dec Lesley PLease send me the volumes Nelson has still not given it to us Tom Donohoe the trader and I Also please let me know the indexgasdaily volumes or who to speak to in your office about that Thanks Mark First Mth Noms for Enron Single Sheetxls

Re Production Update Cc I do not need to know what the production updates are unless they are directly reflecting Enrons allocation Please send me nom changes only Thanks Mark on PM To cc Subject Production Update Block Volume Time Comments WC mmcfd noon B Well mmcfd added to A Ver mmcfd am Ramping up at am to mmcfd

Re Fwd Nomination Revision for VR wells Cc Please have her call me as of the th we have been shorted by Assuming the rate of flow to be the same or less then we will be short overall I have taken the nom to please let me know how this will be made up by the end of the month Mark

Fwd Nomination Revision for VR wellsForwarded by Mark L SchrabHOUECT on PM on PM To cc Subject Fwd Nomination Revision for VR wells Mark I will call you to figure this out Meanwhile I think Marilyn Gullette can give you better information to catch us up on noms Her number is ContentTransferEncoding bit ReturnPath Received from rlyyhmxaolcom rlyyhmailaolcom by airyhmailaolcom v with ESMTP Mon Nov Received from linuxglobalreachnet linuxglobalreachnet by rlyyhmxaolcom vr with ESMTP Mon Nov Received from marilyn asglobalreachnet by linuxglobalreachnet with SMTP id LAA Mon Nov From Marilyn Gullette To Bill Young Email Tom Jones Email Cc Alfred Thomas IIIlinuxglobalreachnet Subject Nomination Revision for VR wells Date Mon Nov MessageID cfabacacmarilyn MIMEVersion ContentType textplain charsetiso XPriority Normal XMSMailPriority Normal XMailer Microsoft Outlook CWS Build XMimeOLE Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V Importance Normal This is to request that Spinnakers nomination for the VR wells be lowered from the current nom of mmbtu to mmbtu effective start of day on The reduction is necessary as a result of the SI of the well on Friday through the current time Monday combined with shutins that occurred on and This nomination volume is based on an assumed rate of through the end of the month Thank you for your prompt attention to this request Marilyn Gullette

Francis Berry Johnson Bayou Gas for Oct Cc As you know Grand Cheniere was under maintenance in October and we had to shut in Johson Bayou Francis wants us to reallocate trespass gas that they continued to flow onto ANR in the amout of mm to us at an agreed upon price of ANR has agreed to do this next week Since you are out today Francis asked us to make sure you called him about this as well as another issue Mark

Grand Chenere outage last cycle on the th Cc I tried to leave you a message about what happened on the last cycle for gas day but your voicemail at the office didnt work Grand Chenere compressor went down by MM in total late saturday night This affected of supply coming from HIOS and SE Transmission pool purchases I was able to make up on the th by increasing our HIOS nom and paying back PGE ANR said the compressor is back up now however with shippers doing makeup this could cause more capacity cuts for the th Ill be back tomorrow Ive got jury duty today WT left me a messge at the office that they went down but they didnt page me so we were cut at SS over the weekendwhich also cut our SE Tran markets Ive taken them down to unless youd like to shut them in Deal Mark pager Kirk Shawn at Duke said he cut us at NMaumeeML by see if our Mkt wants makeup for th

Re Mark HIOS just called and asked that Enron nom a for HI beginning May instead of Cc I have nominated mm at on the th and taken it to mm per Charlene on the th As of the th I took it to Our trader Tom Donohoe has told me that since you have a force majure there as of the th we can not take the well to and it will be at till you are flowing gas to us again If you have gas that flows onto the system we will discuss buying it from you later in the month Please have your marketer call Tom Donohoe if you need to discuss this at Mark Victor Haley on PM To cc Subject Mark HIOS just called and asked that Enron nom a for HI beginning May instead of Mark HIOS just called and asked that Enron nom a for HI beginning May instead of The reason for this is that their system needs this to allocate correctly Please advise if you have any questions at Thanks

ANR HIOS penalty calculation for Please dont share this with Hunter as Mary has not finalized the numbers Forwarded by Mark L SchrabHOUECT on PM Mary NRON PM To Mark L CT cc Subject ANR HIOS penalty calculation for THESE ARE PRELIMINARY CALCULATIONS FOR ONLY DO TO BE DISTRIBUTED AS FINAL PRODUCT

Re changes on ANR effective Ive got the changes in Please advise me how you or Charlene plans to work off the imbalances on both ANR and HIOS for this month Thanks Mark Victor Haley on PM To cc Subject changes on ANR effective attached is Charlenes spreadsheet showing changes on HI and HI for April Also the PVR percentage has changed affecting all the blocks Also please change your nom to day on WC effective as well Any questions please call me at HIOS nom sheetxls
Devon Availabilities May Attached is Devons monthly spreadsheet of availabilities for May If you have any questions at all please call me at EnronAvailsxls

DEVON June noms Cc Charlene Please forward to Victor also but for next month Ill need the first of the month nominations asap in order to confirm all locations total Index and Gas Daily volumes for both HIOS and ANR Please let me know as soon as possible and also send final revisions directly to me I will also need to confirm totals verbally after you have send the final nominations for June Thanks Mark

RE Panaco and Devon noms for the first of MAYNelson I have all of Devons numbers for May and nothing from Panaco and nothing from ProGas Ill be glad to put the deals in if you can help me get the numbers Thanks Oh I have called Tri Star and I have put thier number in too Mark

Panaco finally sent the first of May Mark Forwarded by Mark L SchrabHOUECT on AM Lesley Strange on AM To Mark Schrab Email Mary Ellenberger Email Naleesha Roberts Nelson Ferries Email cc Subject First Mth Noms for Enron single sheetxls

Re HIOSCharlene When you called this morning you told me there were changes for the first of May not the th of this month I cant make changes now Youll have to have the operator reallocate the gas if you want to make up to Enron I cant cut any markets at this point for the weekend Mark Charlene Merrill on AM To cc Subject HIOS Please change our nom on the HI effective april th thanks Charlene HIOS nom sheetxls

Rankings for SourceDestination Please forward to logistics in your region Would any of the desks be opposed to enabling Unify to default the Destination rankings to the same rankings that are created in the Source rankings There would still be the ability to change to ranking on the Destination side however it would not affect the rankings on the Source side This will save time pathing and prevent the amount of data entry errors Would you please forward comments to your manager Dave Nommenson is aware that some of us are interested in this and would like to find out if it would be something worth putting into production Thanks

EnronBPCrestar Apr Conversation re AOS GasLpst Forwarded by Mark L SchrabHOUECT on AM Jim Pearson on PM To cc Gerry Kurtz Subject EnronBPCrestar Apr Conversation re AOS Gas The following is a summary of our conversation on Tuesday April re communication time lines MCT By this deadline Gerry Kurtz will phone Elizabeth Bartnes with the AOS volumes if any to be purchased and transported by BP to Enron KeySpan will indicate the BP AOS decatherms to be sold to Enron as well as the EM GJ and delivery point for the Crestar gas to be sold to BP MCT By this deadline Gerry will phone Mark Schrab of Enron to advise him whether and how many decatherms of AOS will flow to Enron and how much will be provided by each of BP and Crestar The relative share of AOS gas to be provided by BP and Crestar will not necessarily be prorated according to their shares of the Mcf Contract Capacity At this time Mark will likely have a good idea of the downstream volumes contracts and pipelines applicable to at least the BP portion of the AOS supplied to Enron He will first respond to the offered BP AOS supply by providing the BP information if available verbally to Gerry and will follow up by confirming to both Elisabeth and Gerry in an emailspreadsheet shortly after It is understood that Enron is under no obligation to accept an AOS nomination if KeySpan misses the MCT deadline MCT As described above before this deadline Mark will have sent an email to both BP and Crestar detailing the destinations of the BP AOS sale to Enron By this deadline Mark will then send an emailspreadsheet to Gerry regarding the destinations of the Crestar Firm and AOS sales to Enron It is understood that Enron will be responsible for any pipeline imbalance or other charges if Enron does not meet the MCT deadline MCT By this deadline both BP and Crestar will nominate their respective supply volumes to Alliance for delivery to Enron and its markets BP or Crestar will be responsible for any charges which they may cause Enron to incur if they fail to nominate to Alliance by MCT If I have missed any details please let me know Jim

Crestar BP Cc Lpst Patrice Just wanted to keep you in the loopI talked to Crestar and BP Canada on a conference call today and we have made a game plan for dealing with the AOS daily volume changes I understand that BP and Crestar have entered an agreement which Enron will be purchasing up to daily Up to will be coming from BP and up to purchased from Crestar on a daily basis I assume there will be two separate tickets in the event there are cuts that need to be accounted for on either counterparty We have agreed to receive the volume of AOS from Gerry at Crestar by am Houston time every day and return to either both counterparties via Email or at least to BP the delivery point and the downstream contract for the AOS portion of the purchase from BP by Houston time I have told them both for the sake of simplifying things the default delivery will be ANRAlliance for baseload contract assuming we have one and assuming the volume works If you have any questions please let me know Thanks Mark

Devon and PanacoI just wanted to let you know that I have been working with the settlements group in order to put approx into the Central and East desk books for Devon penalties that have been incurred over the last year Settlements should be talking with the Risk group in order to get this done soon We are also working to determine the Pipeline cash out as a result of Panacos imbalance over the last year After talking with legal it appears that we do have remedy to recoup cash out from Panaco Ill keep you informed when I have more information If you have any questions please let me know Mark
